Data
About me

Data

10,986 Rows 11 Columns Each row is a Course

Data Source

The data was taken from the University of Illinois course dataset. The spring 2020 dataset was used. This dataset was parsed from the University of Illinois public API access.


The data was wrangled to a form that would work for D3. This is an object with a nodes and links array.

The sections for each course was also taken in order to provide the calendar.

Currently Used Columns

Column Description
Subject Course subject (ie. ABE, CS, ...)
Number Course number (ie. 456, 141, ...)
Credit Hours Credit Hours of the course (ie. 3 hours.)
Name Name of the course
Description Description of the course
Start Time Start of the section
End Time End of the section
Instructors Instructor(s) for the given section

CIS Data Explorer

From the CIS documentation:

The Catalog and Schedule API are publicly accessible, via the Data Explorer App.

University of Illinois. 2020. Spring 2020 Course Dataset [CSV File]. Retrieved from https://github.com/illinois/courses-dataset on April 23, 2020.

Note that the data was not directly taken from the CIS data explorer. The data was taken from the preprocessed GitHub page.
